thread.title: WATCH: Hazard and Chelsea team-mates amazed by magician
thread.title_full: WATCH: Hazard and Chelsea team-mates amazed by magician

title: WATCH: Hazard and Chelsea team-mates amazed by magician
text:
0 Feb 23, 2017 00:05:20 The Chelsea attacker got a taste of his own medicine of sorts when magician Ben Hanlin performed a trick in the dressing room EXTRA TIME 
Eden Hazard is known for producing magic on the pitch, but this time it was he who was left amazed by a different kind in the Chelsea dressing room. 
Hazard hails Chelsea's super home form 
The Blues players have previously been left in shock by David Luiz's tricks , but this time it was television magician Ben Hanlin who had them aghast. 
Hanlin asked Hazard to sign a ticket and had the attacker hold it while he ripped off a corner. He then chewed and swallowed the small piece and then, amazingly, put it back in place. When magician @benhanlin met the Chelsea squad... pic.twitter.com/OtW4INmtPs â€” Chelsea FC (@ChelseaFC) February 22, 2017 
Hazard gave it a tug to make sure it was back on as normal, and so it was, while all the players around were surprised, Diego Costa seemed particularly bamboozled. Related
